newsitem.title: JAPAN: Tokyo Disneyland visitors total 17.4 mln in 96/97.
newsitem.headline: Tokyo Disneyland visitors total 17.4 mln in 96/97.

text.p: Japanese theme park operator Oriental Land Co Ltd said on Tuesday that a total of 17.4 million people visited its Tokyo Disneyland theme park in the year ended ended March 31, up from 17.0 million in 1995/96.
The company expects the number of visitors in the 1997/98 year, which started on Tuesday, will at least exceed 17 million, a company spokesman said.
Tokyo Disneyland, which is near Tokyo, opened in 1983.
